Menace
[i]Brain Fingerprint[/i] – When Satori enters, look at target player's hand. You may exile a nonland card from it.
Whenever Satori deals combat damage to a player, exile target card from that player's graveyard.
[i]Terrible Souvenir[/i] – You may cast cards exiled with Satori and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast them.
